text: The 1888 Sundsvall Fire () was a fire in the town of Sundsvall in Sweden. The fire happened on 25 June 1888. The fire occurred during a storm. The storm allowed the fire to spread fast among the wooden houses in town. The same day a fire also occurred in the town of Ume√•. ==References== Category:1888 in Europe Category:1880s in Sweden Category:Fires in Sweden Category:Sundsvall
title: 1888 Sundsvall fire
